name: rhd-frontend
description: Front-end assets and documentation for Red Hat Developer site

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.test: npm run scripts && karma start src/tests/unit/config/karma.conf.js
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.scripts:copy: cpx rhd.js src/docs/themes/rhd/static/js && cpx rhd.min.js src/docs/themes/rhd/static/js
scripts.styles: node-sass src/styles/ -o styles/ && node-sass src/styles/ -o ./ --output-style compressed && postcss -o rhd.min.css rhd.css
scripts.serve: npm run start && browser-sync start -c browser-sync.config.js
scripts.docs:front: npm run docs:styles && npm run docs:scripts
scripts.hugo: npm run start && hugo server -D -w -s src/docs --config src/docs/config.dev.toml

author: <ldary@redhat.com>
